name: Unbrowse
description: Open source API reverse engineering for OpenClaw. Capture any API and turn it into monetizable skills for AI agents.

skillsOutputDir.description: Directory where generated skills are saved

browserPort.description: Port for browser CDP control API

autoDiscover.description: Automatically generate skills when the agent browses APIs

apiKey.description: API key for authenticated marketplace operations (publish, install, execute)

creatorWallet.description: Solana wallet address for receiving USDC payments

solanaPrivateKey.description: Base58-encoded Solana private key for x402 payments

defaultPrice.description: Default price for published skills (0 = free, or $0.10-$100 USDC)

proxyCountry.description: Default proxy country for stealth browser (us, gb, de, etc.)

credentialSource.description: Where to look up login passwords for auto-login

skillsOutputDir.label: Skills Output Directory
skillsOutputDir.help: Where generated skills are saved locally

browserPort.label: Browser Control Port
browserPort.help: Port for browser CDP control API (default: 18791)

autoDiscover.label: Auto-Discover Skills
autoDiscover.help: Automatically generate skills when browsing APIs

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Unbrowse API key for publishing skills to the marketplace. Get one from your account settings.

marketplace.creatorWallet.label: Creator Wallet (Solana)
marketplace.creatorWallet.help: Your Solana wallet address for receiving USDC when others download your skills

marketplace.solanaPrivateKey.label: Payment Private Key
marketplace.solanaPrivateKey.help: Base58-encoded Solana private key for paying x402 USDC when downloading paid skills

marketplace.defaultPrice.label: Default Skill Price
marketplace.defaultPrice.help: Default price when publishing skills (0 = free)

browser.proxyCountry.label: Proxy Country
browser.proxyCountry.help: Default proxy location for stealth browser

credentialSource.label: Credential Source
credentialSource.help: Where to look up login passwords. 'keychain' = macOS Keychain, '1password' = 1Password CLI
